row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Validate input parameters :SET &UC4RB_INSTANCE_OPTION# = "" :SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = ""
:IF &UC4RB_INSTANCE_ID# = "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# = "" : PRINT "Invalid input paramters. Either instance ID or network interface ID must be set" : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_INSTANCE_OPTION# = "-n &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID#" : ENDIF :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# <> "" : PRINT "Invalid input paramters. Only one of instance ID or network interface ID is set, not both" : EXIT 1 : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_INSTANCE_OPTION# = "-i &UC4RB_INSTANCE_ID#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_IP# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = "&UC4RB_AWS_IP#" :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID# = "" : PRINT "Error: Allocation ID is required for VPC" : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = "-a &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS# = ''
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_PRIV_IP# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS#, '-p &UC4RB_AWS_PRIV_IP# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_REASSOC# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS#, '--allow-reassociation') :ENDIF
echo Associating Elastic IP address..
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-associate-address &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_INSTANCE_OPTION# &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# &UC4RB_VPC_OPTIONS#
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Failed to associate address exit $ret else echo Successfully associate address fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "ADDRESS*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 8, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 9) ! Replace the tab character with single space to easier to split : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ")
: DEFINE &results#, string, 5 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ") : SET &len# = LENGTH(&results#[])
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_EL_IP_ADDR# = &results#[1] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NI# = &results#[2] : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_EL_IP_ADDR#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_NI#, , "WORKFLOW"
: PRINT 'Elastic IP Address: &UC4RB_OUT_EL_IP_ADDR#' : PRINT 'Instance or network interface: &UC4RB_OUT_NI#'
: IF &results#[3] <> "" : SET &UC4RB_OUT_ALLOC_ID# = &results#[3] : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_ALLOC_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PRINT 'Allocation ID: &UC4RB_OUT_ALLOC_ID#' : ENDIF
: IF &results#[4] <> "" : SET &UC4RB_OUT_PRIV_IP# = &results#[4] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_ASSOC_ID# = &results#[4] : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_ASSOC_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PRINT 'Association ID: &UC4RB_OUT_ASSOC_ID#' : ENDIF
: IF &results#[5] <> "" : SET &UC4RB_OUT_PRIV_IP# = &results#[5] : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_PRIV_IP#, , "WORKFLOW" : PRINT 'Private IP Address: &UC4RB_OUT_PRIV_IP#' : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
